title: Augmented Reality-Based Mobile Learning Course to Strengthen Vocational High School Education Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational concepts in vocational education and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive course enhancing vocational education competencies through hands-on augmented reality (AR) content and mobile learning tools, operating a formative assessment-centered feedback system.

learning_goals: Enhances problem-solving skills in vocational fields by utilizing Augmented Reality-based Mobile Learning (ARMOL).
Strengthens teamwork and communication competencies in AR technology-integrated simulation environments.
Develops creative thinking and critical analytical skills through mobile learning tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
